A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: cool star wars action sequences\, build-up to an awesome saber scene\, but climax\, and close out were weak...so much potential to take the series somewhere new\, and they just blew it. I didn't leave the theater in suspense\, agonizing that I had to wait 2 years to see what happens next...just felt like a blah sequel...and all of the nostalgia is now gone... wasted. I need a wormhole to a parallel dimension where someone else wrote these sequels and took this story a different way...
